text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/howto/auth.html#digestcaveat says that Mozilla and
Netscape doesn't support MD5 digest authentication.

That bug has been fixed in Mozilla:
http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=15860
creator: netdemonz@yahoo.com
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
This document was updated 11 days ago :) just the website needs to be updated.

See: http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-docs-1.3/htdocs/manual/howto/auth.html

However, thanks for the report!

Erik
